title: How to be a book lover: 30 Practical steps to reclaim your lost reading passion
description: You, as an avid book reader, have definitely gone through your peak reading passion at some point in your life. Maybe in your childhood or afterward. I know you still remember those days when you were sleeping and hugging a book. You wonder, like me and many other readers, why you donâ€™t have such a strong passion anymore. How to reclaim your reading passion again. How to be a book lover after a long separation. In this book, I share my personal experience of over 45 years of book reading journey joined with more than 160 philosophers, scientists, authors, and readers who found their way back to their old reading passion. This book has 30 quick yet effective, practical steps to take you back there. This book is for you.
author: Sulaiman Algharbi
